main event: A single object was observed changing color from reddish to bluish while moving across the sky for 3 minutes.
interesting points: The observer concluded that the object behaved like an aircraft.,The object was seen moving west.,The duration of observation was 3 minutes., Witness reported the object appeared to be solid and emitted no exhaust., The sighting was detailed in correspondence to Project Blue Book.
witness description: A civilian observer who reported the sighting to the Air Force.
